Text: If you want do download it faster click 'get torrent file' and uncheck all 'backup' folders - you most propably won't need them.

the installers should work just fine. If not you may try to install updates from backup folders - in this case you need to follow the instructions of the second part of the description.

If the installers can't retrieve version info then try reinstalling the game or try adding these reg keys:
Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINESOFTWAREWow6432NodeMicrosoftWindowsCurrentVersionUninstall{9D15E813-0C26-41E7-ABC5-3EB06FF1B3CF}]
"DisplayName"="Assassin's Creed(R) III v1.01"
"DisplayVersion"="1.01"
"Version"=dword:01010000
"MajorVersion"=dword:00000001
"MinorVersion"=dword:00000001

To anyone trying to install The Tyranny of King Washington or these updates on  Assassin's Creed III - THETA (2012) PC [ENG/RUS] RePack, i want to tell you it will not work. Reason for this is that  Assassin's Creed III - THETA (2012) PC [ENG/RUS] RePack does not use ubisoft game launcher, which is necessary to install The Tyranny of King Washington or these updates. It will work if it is R.G. Mechanics or Skidrow.

These updates are originally made for this torrent:
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7844040/Assassin_s_Creed_III_-_THETA_%282012%29_PC_%5BENG_RUS%5D_RePack
